overview:
Bei-Yi Shen is currently Richi.com’s COO and also serving as its Head of Marketing Previously.

Bei-Yi brings a wealth of experience from the broadcasting world, after serving as the main broadcaster for several prominent Taiwanese shows, spanning topics such as Primetime News, Branding, Entrepreneurship, and Technology. She has also been handpicked to be the facilitator at at IBM Developer Conference, Cloud Computing Conference, Financial Strategies Conference, etc.
